channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for TN
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for TN

item.title: Report X-2023110065
item.description:
Report X-2023110065

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-20
  • City: OOLTEWAH
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unable to determine the sequence of events due to lack of communication with the shift when the damage occurred. DescribePack: There is a dent on the side and on the lid which created separation between the lid and the body of the pail. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged pail was placed in a bin and taken to a QA station where it was taken to be processed.

item.title: Report X-2023101374
item.description:
Report X-2023101374

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: OOLTEWAH
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unable to determine sequence of events due to lack of communication with previous sort. DescribePack: Box became wet on top and sides due to a loose cap that caused one of the bottles to leak. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a bucket to prevent further leakage and was taken to a QA station out of the way of other workers.

item.title: Report X-2023101337
item.description:
Report X-2023101337

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-17
  • City: MOUNT JULIET
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND LEAKING DURRING VAN LOAD. TOP OF BOX WAS WET FROM INNER LEAKAGE. THE OUTER PACKING WAS SIZED FOR 4 BOTTLES ONLY TWO WERE HOUSED WITHIN. CARDBOARD DIVIDERS WERE USED AS WELL AS PAPER PACKING TO TRY AND SUPPORT THE TWO BOTTLES. DescribePack: ONE OF THE BOTTLES WAS MISSING A CAP. CAP WAS FOUND IN THE ZIP LOCK BAG BOTTLE WAS SET IN. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE MOVED TO HAZMAT TOTE AND PLACED IN CAGE

item.title: Report X-2023101298
item.description:
Report X-2023101298

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-16
  • City: KNOXVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found at 600 line wet from open and leaking gallon of low voc primer. Package was taken to HAZMAT cage to isolate and await processing. DescribePack: Can of primer leaked at the lid that had opened. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was notified of issue who then took package to the HAZMAT cage to isolate and await processing

item.title: Report X-2023101297
item.description:
Report X-2023101297

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-16
  • City: KNOXVILLE
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found load side where a strong smell was coming from the box. QA was contacted to come look at it where it was found that the seal on the lid of the bottle had broken allowing liquid to spill out. Package was taken to QA to isolate and await processing DescribePack: spill occurred at the lid where the plastic seal around the lid broke allowing lid to come off and liquid to spill. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: package was taken to QA to isolate and await processing
